subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tim Wakefield earned his 200th career win in an 18-6 pounding of Toronto that ended Boston’s five-game skid and provided some more breathing room in the wild-card race.
snippet: Tim Wakefield earned his 200th career win in an 18-6 pounding of Toronto that ended Boston’s five-game skid and provided some more breathing room in the wild-card race.
